DOC.brief_summary: The first aim study obtain chirurgical micro biopsy myoblast culture differentiate Diaphragm fiber . Then fiber submit mechanical stress condition similar impose vivo mechanical ventilation validate human model vitro diaphragm dysfunction induce mechanical ventilation . DOC.criteria: Patient undergo surgery localise bronchopulmonary tumor ( stade 1A ) , stop smoke since 6 month clinically stable . Patients neuromuscular disorder , heart desease , chronic obtructive pulmonary disease , metabolic disorder infection .
